Animation | <center> [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:LumTreeTaller.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:LumTreeBloom.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:LumTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! rowspan=2|Aura (boost nearby auras) | rowspan=2|<center> N/A || <center> x1.01 || <center> x1.02 || <center>x1.03 |- | colspan=3|'''Note: A Berry can only be affected by a single Lum boost at a time''' |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
